entity.cobbleloots.loot_ball.error.is_op: You can't open a loot ball while it's being opened!
entity.cobbleloots.loot_ball.error.alrea: This loot ball has already been opened!
entity.cobbleloots.loot_ball.error.coold: You must wait %s before opening again!
entity.cobbleloots.loot_ball.info.no_loo: This loot ball has no loot!
entity.cobbleloots.loot_ball.set.item: Loot Ball content was set to: %s [×%s]
item.cobbleloots.loot_ball.tooltip.1: A mysterious ball that contains loot!
item.cobbleloots.loot_ball.tooltip.2: Work in progress! Some features may not work as expected or may not be implemented yet!
item.cobbleloots.dowsing_machine.chunks: A hidden loot ball was detected within 2 chunks!
item.cobbleloots.dowsing_machine.near: A hidden loot ball is near!
item.cobbleloots.dowsing_machine.tooltip: Right click to search for HIDDEN loot balls within a 2-chunk radius
item.cobbleloots.dowsing_machine.very_ne: A hidden loot ball is VERY near!
text.config.cobbleloots-config.option.do: Enable loot balls from archaeology loot tables
Enable loot balls from chest loot tables
Enable loot balls from block drops
Enable loot balls from fishing loot tables
text.config.cobbleloots-config.option.ge: Chance of generating a Loot Ball
text.config.cobbleloots-config.option.hi: Chance of generating hidden Loot Balls
text.config.cobbleloots-config.option.ig: Ignore the remaining uses of Loot Balls.
This affects single and multiplayer worlds!
text.config.cobbleloots-config.option.ma: Maximum Loot Balls that are attempted to be generated per chunk
text.config.cobbleloots-config.option.mi: Minimum Loot Balls that are attempted to be generated per chunk
text.config.cobbleloots-config.option.na: Number of uses of naturally generated Loot Balls
text.config.cobbleloots-config.option.ra: Randomize the loot for the next player that opens a loot ball
This only affects if the loot ball has a loot table
text.config.cobbleloots-config.title: Loot Balls configurations
